name: Sun & Star
description:
The universe has been born, shape it as you will.


Sun & Star is about growing a universe from the bare bones. Split stars, collect debris, and expand the world

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button - Build stars
Right Mouse Button - Build planets and moons
Middle Mouse Scroll - Zoom
Middle Mouse Click & Drag - Move camera
Middle Mouse Click on Star or Planet - Hold camera centered on that
point, click the object again to release camera (not ideal for clicking fast moving objects)


I put a video tutorial on YouTube that'll help cover the very basics. All bugs I've found have since been killed.


I made this as a challenge to spend New Years Day doing what I want success in over the year (#NYDJAM). While I consider this "finished" (not really), I will be adding in content and cleaning this up when I have time.
